    • Method Detail

      • register

        public CMember register(java.lang.String _firstname,
                        java.lang.String _lastname,
                        int _ID,
                        java.lang.String _mail)
        This methods registers a user to use the platform and enters him into the member list if the given mail string is not already in use. This method creates an instance of CMember if the mail string given is not already in use.
        Parameters:
        _firstname - Character string that represents the firstname of the member
        _lastname - Character string that represents the lastname of the member
        _ID - Integer value that represents the ID to be used, probably given by the database
        _mail - Character string that represents the E-Mail of the member
        Returns:
        Null if the mail is already in use, an instance of CMember with the given parameters if the mail is not already in use

      • login

        public boolean login(java.lang.String _mail)
        This methods logs a user into the platform if his mail is correct.
        Parameters:
        _mail - Character string that represents the E-Mail of the member
        Returns:
        True if the mail exists in the member list, false if not

      • addMember

        public void addMember(CMember _member)

      • deleteMember

        public void deleteMember(CMember _member)
        This method deletes a CMember from the platform, all reference to him and removes him from his courses.
        Parameters:
        _member - Instance of CMember that represents the member to be deleted

      • addAdmin

        public void addAdmin(CMember _admin)

      • removeAdmin

        public boolean removeAdmin(CMember _admin)

      • addInstitution

        public int addInstitution()
        This method creates an instance of CInstitution and therefor creates an instance of CLicense For our uses it is enough to just generate a random ID, with higher numbers of institutions we would implement an autoincrement.
        Returns:
        Integer value that represents the ID of the institution that just got created

      • removeInstitution

        public boolean removeInstitution(int _ID)
        This method removes an instance of CInstitution if the an institution with the given ID could be found. Therefor it uses the helper function getInstitutionByID
        Parameters:
        _ID - Integer value that represents the ID of the institution to be removed
        Returns:
        True if institution was found and removed, false if not

      • getInstitutionByID

        public CInstitution getInstitutionByID(int _ID)
        This method searches for a CInstitution with the given ID
        Parameters:
        _ID - Integer value that represents the ID of the institution to be searched
        Returns:
        An instance of CInstitution when the given ID could be found, null if not

      • getMemberListSize

        public int getMemberListSize()
